Package me.agno.gridjavacore.columns

Class GridCoreColumn<T,TData>

java.lang.Object
me.agno.gridjavacore.columns.GridCoreColumn<T,TData>
Type Parameters:
T - The type of the grid's data.
TData - The type of the column's data.
All Implemented Interfaces:
IColumn<T>, IFilterableColumn<T>, IGridColumn<T>, ISearchableColumn<T>, ISortableColumn<T>, ITotalsColumn<T>
public class GridCoreColumn<T,TData> extends Object implements IGridColumn<T>
Represents a column in the GridCore grid.

    • GridCoreColumn

      public GridCoreColumn(String expression, Class<TData> targetType, IGrid<T> grid)
      Represents a column in a grid.
      Parameters:
      expression - the expression used for sorting, filtering, and searching the column
      targetType - the class representing the target type of the column
      grid - the grid in which the column belongs to
